body_html: The reason why it uses much memory is that grid_sample requires contiguous tensors internally, and if the tensors are not contiguous it make them contiguous. When you expand your tensor, you make them non-contiguous. We currently use cudnn for the grid_sample on the GPU, so we can't do much for supporting non-contiguous cases at the moment.

body: The reason why it uses much memory is that `grid_sample` requires contiguous tensors internally, and if the tensors are not contiguous it make them contiguous. When you expand your tensor, you make them non-contiguous. We currently use cudnn for the `grid_sample` on the GPU, so we can't do much for supporting non-contiguous cases at the moment.
